abstract: Two videos show the police warning protesters that they would be arrested if they crossed the Brooklyn Bridge's roadway.
snippet: Two videos show the police warning protesters that they would be arrested if they crossed the Brooklyn Bridge's roadway.
lead_paragraph: Updated 12:33 p.m. | With the Internet bursting with videos showing various interactions between the police and protesters from Occupy Wall Street, the New York Police Department decided to add two more.

headline.main: Police Gave Warnings at Bridge, Videos Show
